name: Toilet Paper Apocalypse
description:
This is March 14th, the news are all about the toilet paper panic..... and you don't have any left. Time to run.

Toilet Paper Apocalypse is a runner  game where you play as a little french woman having to run to find toilet paper before the world frenzy finishes emptying the alley of her supermarket !

In this game you will find : 

A three level story where you will discover the cartoony adventure of the protagonist and their struggle to avoid collision with old people, coughing idiots, angry moms and so many more colorful ennemies~ 

An infinite version  of each individual level with a point system and collectible to catch as you go ! 

Wishing you a fun time  !!!

Game made by Lapaduza and Taehupo in a  "one week challenge" to make people laugh and smile
